LABEL: 0x351
STRING: 「How brave of you, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x37E
STRING: Her sarcastic tone brought my soaring spirit back to reality.

LABEL: 0x3C0
STRING: Eradication - I repeated what I'd just said again in my mind.

LABEL: 0x410
STRING: But no matter what anyone said, it didn't change what we had to do.

LABEL: 0x4CC
STRING: 「Does anyone know how to make a bomb?」

LABEL: 0x503
STRING: A bomb―a tool for physical annihilation.

LABEL: 0x53B
STRING: The word felt so far removed from reality that I could only think of a toy painted in primary colors.

LABEL: 0x597
STRING: However, her face betrayed no sign of joking around.

LABEL: 0x5DB
STRING: Reiri was being serious.

LABEL: 0x601
STRING: And because we all knew that, none of us could say anything.

LABEL: 0x641
STRING: The unsettling silence was finally broken by the click of her tongue.

LABEL: 0x6E5
STRING: 「What a bunch of useless grown-ups.」

LABEL: 0x707
STRING: 「Did you hear me, doctor?」

LABEL: 0x73A
STRING: Her sadistic voice shot through Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x762
STRING: Standing there with his arms folded, he raised his eyes from his feet.

LABEL: 0x7AD
STRING: 「...If we combine the chemicals in the lab, we should be able to make explosives, but――」

LABEL: 0x808
STRING: 「That's good enough.」

LABEL: 0x826
STRING: 「We can use the PDAs to make a simple detonator. At most, it'll create sparks, but...」

LABEL: 0x88B
STRING: 「If we use gunpowder in combination, there's no problem. The good doctor can do that much, can't he?」

LABEL: 0x8F8
STRING: 「We can't control it exactly, but if it causes enough of an explosion to damage the pipes――」

LABEL: 0x975
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei!」

LABEL: 0x996
STRING: Yukari interrupted Hiragino sharply.

LABEL: 0xA95
STRING: 「Reiri-san, do you understand what you're saying?」

LABEL: 0xAE3
STRING: 「Using a makeshift bomb is insane.」

LABEL: 0xB39
STRING: 「The idea to steam the steam room is crazy to begin with, and we're going to do that using a handmade bomb...?」

LABEL: 0xB91
STRING: 「Do you actually think that'll work?」

LABEL: 0xC41
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0xC6A
STRING: Reiri smiled fearlessly.

LABEL: 0xC88
STRING: Her attitude was intimidating, but Yukari showed no signs of backing down.

LABEL: 0xD32
STRING: 「...I'm not sure how much you know, but――」

LABEL: 0xDDB
STRING: 「There are too many dangerous parts to this plan.」

LABEL: 0xE0F
STRING: 「First of all, Hiragino-sensei is an excellent doctor, but he's not an expert in chemistry.」

LABEL: 0xE5D
STRING: 「What if he fails to make the bomb? What if the bomb he's making explodes prematurely?」

LABEL: 0xEAB
STRING: 「Or, it could be a dud. In any case, chemical control is fraught with uncertainty.」

LABEL: 0xF8B
STRING: 「...Is that all you have to say?」

LABEL: 0xFC0
STRING: Reiri cut her off with an unusually calm tone.

LABEL: 0x104E
STRING: Was she saying that all of that was within her expectations?

LABEL: 0x109C
STRING: Who knew what kind of a counterargument she was preparing...

LABEL: 0x10E0
STRING: ――Then, she turned toward me.

LABEL: 0x1180
STRING: 「Isn't that right?」

LABEL: 0x11A1
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x11B7
STRING: A surprised voice escaped my lips.

LABEL: 0x11DB
STRING: Reiri looked up at me with carefree eyes.

LABEL: 0x1211
STRING: As I stared at her face in silence, her innocent expression dissipated.

LABEL: 0x12C5
STRING: 「How long are you going to keep up your stupid facade?」

LABEL: 0x12F5
STRING: 「Think.」

LABEL: 0x139C
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x13B7
STRING: What did she want me to do?

LABEL: 0x13F3
STRING: Reiri spoke bluntly to me since I didn't understand what she was getting at.

LABEL: 0x144C
STRING: 「It's what you wanted.」

LABEL: 0x147B
STRING: What I wanted...?

LABEL: 0x14A1
STRING: What was she talking about――

LABEL: 0x14E9
STRING: No, that wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x1503
STRING: That was not the question that needed to be answered right now.

LABEL: 0x1537
STRING: I needed to think about what I could.

LABEL: 0x155D
STRING: I looked back to the others.

LABEL: 0x1641
STRING: 「It's dangerous to use a bomb to destroy the pipes...」

LABEL: 0x167B
STRING: 「I agree with Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x16AF
STRING: 「We've already invested a lot of energy into this plan.」

LABEL: 0x16ED
STRING: 「If we waste time thinking about it now and go out on an all-or-nothing approach, there's too much to lose.」

LABEL: 0x1745
STRING: 「I... want to get out of here with all of you.」

LABEL: 0x17A9
STRING: That was what I thought.

LABEL: 0x17CB
STRING: No matter what anyone said, it wouldn't change.

LABEL: 0x17FF
STRING: I didn't want to let anyone else's hand slip away.

LABEL: 0x189B
STRING: 「You don't want to use a bomb.」

LABEL: 0x18BF
STRING: 「But still, <COOS> has to be eradicated.」

LABEL: 0x1950
STRING: 「I feel like you'd really like rabbits, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x1987
STRING: He who ran after two hares would catch neither. It was a nasty way to put it.

LABEL: 0x19D7
STRING: ――And just as I was about to deny her...

LABEL: 0x1A90
STRING: A sound of someone gasping.

LABEL: 0x1AC4
STRING: I looked over to see Touri frozen in place with her face twitching.

LABEL: 0x1B57
STRING: 「Touri...?」

LABEL: 0x1B73
STRING: She was fine just a second ago...

LABEL: 0x1BB5
STRING: Without any warning, she stiffened up with a pale face.

LABEL: 0x1BEF
STRING: It reminded me of the time when Reiri went missing... She didn't look fine at all.

LABEL: 0x1D1C
STRING: 「Touri-kun... Touri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x1DCB
STRING: She nodded vaguely to Hiragino's calls.

LABEL: 0x1DFB
STRING: She was in a state of utter stupefaction for a moment but eventually shook her head.

LABEL: 0x1E67
STRING: Touri slapped her own cheeks with both hands, and her eyes were once more brimming with life.

LABEL: 0x1F31
STRING: 「How are you feeling...?」

LABEL: 0x1F64
STRING: 「I'm alright.」

LABEL: 0x1FDF
STRING: 「I just zoned out for a minute!」

LABEL: 0x2024
STRING: 「...Didn't look like that to me.」

LABEL: 0x20C0
STRING: 「I'm fine, I'm fine!」

LABEL: 0x20F1
STRING: She certainly looked to be okay from the way she waved her hands as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x212F
STRING: Should I worry about her or not?

LABEL: 0x21A7
STRING: I didn't even know what triggered it.

LABEL: 0x21D9
STRING: It left a bad aftertaste in my mouth, but――

LABEL: 0x2218
STRING: 「So, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x2293
STRING: 「What are we going to do? Any ideas?」

LABEL: 0x22DE
STRING: Reiri.

LABEL: 0x22F2
STRING: Urged on by her voice as if nothing had happened, I resumed my train of thought.

LABEL: 0x233C
STRING: 「I don't...」

LABEL: 0x2362
STRING: 「No, there's no need to think about it.」

LABEL: 0x238A
STRING: 「If doing it remotely isn't possible, a direct approach is the only way.」

LABEL: 0x23EA
STRING: A silent stare.

LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: I couldn't read a single emotion from her expression.

LABEL: 0x2509
STRING: 「Direct? Don't tell me――」

LABEL: 0x2534
STRING: Touri timidly spoke up.

LABEL: 0x255A
STRING: ――Yes, that's right.

LABEL: 0x2582
STRING: 「Let me put this plainly.」

LABEL: 0x25A6
STRING: 「Using a bomb is too dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x25C4
STRING: 「Which is why I'm going to go to the steam room wearing a diving suit and smash the pipes myself.」

LABEL: 0x267A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x26F5
STRING: 「――Are you an idiot?!」

LABEL: 0x271C
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2796
STRING: 「That's way too dangerous!!」

LABEL: 0x27CE
STRING: Touri screamed like she was about to burst.

LABEL: 0x27FC
STRING: Her eyes opened wide like she couldn't believe what I had just said.

LABEL: 0x28A2
STRING: 「You're going to break the pipes and steam them, right?」

LABEL: 0x28E2
STRING: 「There's no way you're going to make it out unharmed!」

LABEL: 0x2983
STRING: 「Why are you always like this...?」

LABEL: 0x29CE
STRING: 「...Touri.」

LABEL: 0x29ED
STRING: Her panicked shouts were interrupted by her sister's quiet whispering.

LABEL: 0x2A9B
STRING: 「Honestly...」

LABEL: 0x2AB9
STRING: 「Screaming like that is a hindrance to our discussion.」

LABEL: 0x2B4F
STRING: Reiri was harsh toward Touri, as usual.

LABEL: 0x2B7D
STRING: Touri no longer showed signs of objecting, so this time, it was Yukari who looked like she had something to say.

LABEL: 0x2C98
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x2CDB
STRING: 「I reluctantly agree with him that it has to be done manually and not with a bomb.」

LABEL: 0x2D82
STRING: 「It's just... Are we really leaving everything to Katagiri-san again...?」

LABEL: 0x2DD5
STRING: 「That's not true.」

LABEL: 0x2E63
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2E7E
STRING: She sounded like she was caught off guard.

LABEL: 0x2EAC
STRING: 「It's not just the person who destroys the pipes that's necessary for this plan to succeed.」

LABEL: 0x2EF4
STRING: 「Rather, the problem is guiding <COOS> into the steam room.」

LABEL: 0x2F36
STRING: 「I need you and Hiragino-san to help me with that.」

LABEL: 0x2FEC
STRING: 「But that doesn't change the fact that you'll be putting yourself in the most danger.」

LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: 「Does it actually matter who destroys the pipes?」

LABEL: 0x308B
STRING: I stopped Yukari from leaning forward with one hand.

LABEL: 0x30BB
STRING: 「...The safest person in this plan will be the "pipe breaker."」

LABEL: 0x3173
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x318E
STRING: 「They're wearing a diving suit that can withstand a water depth of 700 meters.」

LABEL: 0x31FA
STRING: 「Don't you remember Tokiwa's calculations?」

LABEL: 0x32A0
STRING: That was back when I had gone to the rear section to rescue Reiri.

LABEL: 0x32D4
STRING: Tokiwa's handwritten calculations of the pressure and heat resistance...

LABEL: 0x330E
STRING: I'd forgotten the details, but the suit was resistant to all kinds of external stimuli.

LABEL: 0x34C0
STRING: 「As long as you wear that diving suit, which is the very essence of ROMLES' wisdom, you can withstand almost anything.」

LABEL: 0x3520
STRING: 「Even if you were blown away by an explosion, you'd only be bruised at best.」

LABEL: 0x3566
STRING: 「Or if <COOS> happened to attack you, you'd definitely survive.」

LABEL: 0x35D8
STRING: 「Leading <COOS> to the steam room is the bigger problem...」

LABEL: 0x3618
STRING: How would they lure <COOS> without the protection of a diving suit?

LABEL: 0x365C
STRING: Waiting around for them to show up sounded a lot easier to me...

LABEL: 0x36A0
STRING: 「Besides, how are we going to gather all of <COOS> inside the ship, since they could be anywhere...?」

LABEL: 0x3767
STRING: 「According to my calculations...」

LABEL: 0x378B
STRING: 「We need to release the devices from eight locations.」

LABEL: 0x37C7
STRING: Eight locations――

LABEL: 0x37DE
STRING: Should that be considered a lot or little considering that it covered the entire ship?

LABEL: 0x3832
STRING: In any case, Reiri was confident in her calculations.

LABEL: 0x3881
STRING: 「That includes the rear section, right?」

LABEL: 0x38C4
STRING: 「Of course.」

LABEL: 0x38E3
STRING: All things considered, it would probably be best to split into two groups: the front and rear.

LABEL: 0x3937
STRING: Even though the rear section was still more unknown to us, you couldn't say the front section was safe either.

LABEL: 0x399B
STRING: And with those devices with you... It was going to be dangerous either way.

LABEL: 0x39E9
STRING: 「...Do you now understand how I have the safest role out of you all?」

LABEL: 0x3A9F
STRING: 「It sounds like sophistry to me, but yes.」

LABEL: 0x3B43
STRING: 「Then it's decided.」

LABEL: 0x3BC9
STRING: 「――Just one thing.」

LABEL: 0x3BEE
STRING: She persisted.

LABEL: 0x3C42
STRING: She stuck up her index finger and looked straight at me.

LABEL: 0x3CE8
STRING: 「...I have one condition.」

LABEL: 0x3D16
STRING: 「If we're going to split into two groups,

LABEL: 0x3D5E
STRING: I'll be going to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x3D93
STRING: 「You mean... alone?」

LABEL: 0x3DC8
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x3DDE
STRING: 「Touri-san and Reiri-san will be with Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x3E1B
STRING: The rear section could be considered more dangerous of the two.

LABEL: 0x3E47
STRING: Why did she want to go there alone?

LABEL: 0x3E77
STRING: 「...May I ask why?」

LABEL: 0x3EAA
STRING: 「We've confirmed the presence of <COOS> in the rear section...」

LABEL: 0x3EE6
STRING: 「We can't send too many people to a dangerous area like that. I'll be more than enough.」

LABEL: 0x3F3E
STRING: 「Besides, I'm wearing insulated boots.」

LABEL: 0x3F9F
STRING: She turned from me to Hiragino as she explained.

LABEL: 0x3FD3
STRING: I thought it was reckless. But, we couldn't stop now.

LABEL: 0x401B
STRING: Eradicating <COOS> was what mattered.

LABEL: 0x411A
STRING: 「...Sure. The more people, the merrier.」

LABEL: 0x415C
STRING: 「If Momoi says she'll be okay, then――」

LABEL: 0x4199
STRING: 「I'll be fine. Don't worry about me.」

LABEL: 0x41CA
STRING: Hiragino looked awkward as Yukari interrupted him.

LABEL: 0x426E
STRING: 「...Just don't make stupid mistakes like you always do.」

LABEL: 0x4318
STRING: 「When have I ever made a mistake?」

LABEL: 0x4344
STRING: 「Stop trying to make me look bad.」

LABEL: 0x437B
STRING: She closed in on him with a disapproving look on her face.

LABEL: 0x43C2
STRING: 「Same goes for you. Don't try anything funny with the two of them.」

LABEL: 0x446E
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4493
STRING: 「Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x44BC
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x450F
STRING: Yukari put a hand on her shoulder and brought her mouth close to her ear.

LABEL: 0x454F
STRING: She was probably trying to keep it a secret, but something felt strange as Touri bent forward to listen.

LABEL: 0x4680
STRING: 「If it looks like he's going to do something to you, run away immediately.」

LABEL: 0x46D7
STRING: 「He wouldn't do anything, would he?」

LABEL: 0x4710
STRING: 「That's his strategy.」

LABEL: 0x4736
STRING: 「He's already got you under his spell.」

LABEL: 0x47C3
STRING: 「You let your guard down seeing that harmless smile on his face, but what goes on in his head――」

LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: 「What are you two whispering about?」

LABEL: 0x485E
STRING: 「Pay her no mind, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x48FA
STRING: 「Keep quiet, you beast.」

LABEL: 0x4935
STRING: 「Beast?!」

LABEL: 0x4960
STRING: 「Anyway, just be careful, okay?」

LABEL: 0x49FC
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x4A25
STRING: 「Look here...」

LABEL: 0x4A80
STRING: In contrast to Yukari, who nodded her head in satisfaction, Hiragino held his in his hands.

LABEL: 0x4AC6
STRING: Seeing his hopeless expression, Yukari smiled even more cheerfully.

LABEL: 0x4B6E
STRING: 「Let's get ready then.」

LABEL: 0x4B9E
STRING: 「Give us the details, Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4E92
STRING: I was in the dark with my eyes closed.

LABEL: 0x4EB4
STRING: I could feel the silence.

LABEL: 0x4ED0
STRING: The only sounds I heard were my own breathing and quiet mechanical noises.

LABEL: 0x4F10
STRING: No one's voice could be heard.

LABEL: 0x4F2C
STRING: No one else was here.

LABEL: 0x4F46
STRING: And yet...

LABEL: 0x4F60
STRING: There was a sense of oppression lurking between the narrow openings.

LABEL: 0x4F94
STRING: Breathing in and out made me feel like I was suffocating, both physically and mentally.

LABEL: 0x4FE6
STRING: I slowly opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x509D
STRING: I could see a staircase at the edge of my vision.

LABEL: 0x50C1
STRING: I silently raised my head under the dim lighting.

LABEL: 0x50FF
STRING: I followed the stairs with my eyes,

LABEL: 0x518B
STRING: and they eventually%Nstopped at the open door beyond the landing.

LABEL: 0x51C1
STRING: The door connected to the hallway on the first floor of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x524F
STRING: Yes, this was the steam room.

LABEL: 0x5271
STRING: I was sitting in the steam room with my diving suit on right now.

LABEL: 0x5326
STRING: I was bending my knees like I was in gym class while a huge pipe hung over me.

LABEL: 0x536A
STRING: If I looked back, there would be a lot more pipes running all over the place.

LABEL: 0x53BE
STRING: I felt like I was inside the body of some huge creature.

LABEL: 0x5400
STRING: I could tell that my skin was getting damp.

LABEL: 0x5432
STRING: Vaporized sweat and exhaled steam filled my diving suit.

LABEL: 0x5470
STRING: I hated the rainy season.

LABEL: 0x5492
STRING: This feeling was different from when I was outside in the sea.

LABEL: 0x54E0
STRING: Besides the diving suit,

LABEL: 0x551A
STRING: the only things I had with me were two powered-off PDAs.

LABEL: 0x5546
STRING: And, an axe I was gripping in my right hand.

LABEL: 0x5570
STRING: I would use it to destroy the pipes.

LABEL: 0x5600
STRING: ...My grip naturally tightened.

LABEL: 0x5628
STRING: Lifting the axe and feeling its weight, I could tell it guaranteed a certain amount of destructive power.

LABEL: 0x5670
STRING: Once all of <COOS> was gathered in here,

LABEL: 0x56A8
STRING: I would raise this axe high

LABEL: 0x56CC
STRING: and strike the thick pipe in front of me.

LABEL: 0x5702
STRING: There was no need to hesitate.

LABEL: 0x5724
STRING: All I had to do was smash this thing with all my might.

LABEL: 0x576F
STRING: 『...We're ready over here.』

LABEL: 0x5831
STRING: After a moment of static, I heard Hiragino's voice in my ear.

LABEL: 0x5869
STRING: He was using a helmet of another diving suit as a walkie-talkie.

LABEL: 0x58C3
STRING: That was how we shared each other's situations and tried to work out the right timing.

LABEL: 0x5922
STRING: 『Wait a minute, can you hear me, Katagiri-kun?』

LABEL: 0x5967
STRING: 『What? Can't he hear us?』

LABEL: 0x5994
STRING: I could hear Touri's voice from a short distance away.

LABEL: 0x59C2
STRING: The fact that we didn't know if the creatures infected by <COOS> could hear

LABEL: 0x5A0C
STRING: didn't mean you had to shout...

LABEL: 0x5A57
STRING: 『If he can't hear me, then this is awkward...』

LABEL: 0x5AA8
STRING: 『You're right! A man talking to the head of a diving suit is a bit scary.』

LABEL: 0x5B03
STRING: 『Aren't you being a little rude...?』

LABEL: 0x5B4A
STRING: 『Huh? No I'm not?』

LABEL: 0x5B87
STRING: 『Well... That's good, then...』

LABEL: 0x5BB5
STRING: 『Wait, you can hear me, right? Katagiri-kun?』

LABEL: 0x5BF6
STRING: 「Ah, yeah. I can hear you just fine.」

LABEL: 0x5C1C
STRING: What a relaxed exchange.

LABEL: 0x5C4A
STRING: Yukari had been concerned that Hiragino might do something,

LABEL: 0x5C80
STRING: but I was more worried about how excited Touri was.

LABEL: 0x5CCF
STRING: 『Are you doing okay?』

LABEL: 0x5CF3
STRING: 『Everything's fine over here.』

LABEL: 0x5D1A
STRING: Her voice was brimming with energy.

LABEL: 0x5D46
STRING: It was soothing to listen to in this tense atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x5D95
STRING: 『Katagiri-san...?』

LABEL: 0x5DBA
STRING: She sounded worried.

LABEL: 0x5DD6
STRING: I hurriedly responded to her voice, which I had been listening to in silence.

LABEL: 0x5E16
STRING: 「Sorry, Touri. Did something happen?」

LABEL: 0x5E61
STRING: 『...No, we're fine.』

LABEL: 0x5E85
STRING: 『Katagiri-san?』

LABEL: 0x5EA4
STRING: 「Yeah?」

LABEL: 0x5EC9
STRING: 『Don't worry too much.』

LABEL: 0x5F21
STRING: 『I say that since you're so kind.』

LABEL: 0x5F4D
STRING: 『I know you're thinking about how you can't fail now if we want to escape, but...』

LABEL: 0x5FCF
STRING: 『More importantly――』

LABEL: 0x5FF3
STRING: 『Make sure you come back alive, okay?』

LABEL: 0x6022
STRING: Touri...

LABEL: 0x603A
STRING: 「...Got it.」

LABEL: 0x605E
STRING: 「But let me tell you this.」

LABEL: 0x608E
STRING: 「I definitely won't fail... So you can leave this to me.」

LABEL: 0x60D3
STRING: 『We don't have time to talk like this, Touri-kun.』

LABEL: 0x611A
STRING: 『Yeah. Got it.』

LABEL: 0x613A
STRING: 『Well then...』

LABEL: 0x6160
STRING: 『...Don't push yourself too hard.』

LABEL: 0x618B
STRING: 「I know. Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x61B1
STRING: Touri tried her best to act cheerful.

LABEL: 0x61D9
STRING: She had no special knowledge and looked young for her age,

LABEL: 0x6217
STRING: but that didn't mean that she wasn't thinking things through in her own way.

LABEL: 0x6253
STRING: I didn't want to make any more sacrifices.

LABEL: 0x627F
STRING: That feeling was shared by everyone here.

LABEL: 0x62A7
STRING: Come back alive―that was a given.

LABEL: 0x62CF
STRING: We were all going to make it back alive.

LABEL: 0x62EF
STRING: And for that reason, I couldn't fail here.

LABEL: 0x6332
STRING: 『Okay then...』

LABEL: 0x634A
STRING: 『Katagiri-kun, can you hear me?』

LABEL: 0x637B
STRING: 「Yeah. No problem.」

LABEL: 0x63AA
STRING: 『We're at the first location right now.』

LABEL: 0x63DA
STRING: 『Fortunately, we haven't run into <COOS> so far.』

LABEL: 0x644A
STRING: 『We're going to release the first PDA now.』

LABEL: 0x647A
STRING: 「Got it. I'm counting on you.」

LABEL: 0x64A5
STRING: 『That's our line.』

LABEL: 0x64EB
STRING: His voice cut off for a moment.

LABEL: 0x650D
STRING: The thud I heard was probably the sound of a PDA being placed on the floor.

LABEL: 0x6548
STRING: The makeshift PDA raft would make its way down to the first floor along the flowing water.

LABEL: 0x65A0
STRING: 『The rest is up to you.』

LABEL: 0x65C7
STRING: Afterward, Hiragino's team moved on to their next location.

LABEL: 0x6601
STRING: Based on our earlier experiment, there were about seven minutes until the PDA would arrive here.

LABEL: 0x6659
STRING: 「...Phew.」

LABEL: 0x6673
STRING: All I could do was wait.

LABEL: 0x66AB
STRING: The time was slowly approaching.

LABEL: 0x6730
STRING: Quietly.

LABEL: 0x6746
STRING: I breathed in and out.

LABEL: 0x6775
STRING: 『Are you okay, Katagiri-kun?』

LABEL: 0x67A0
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x67CD
STRING: 『You said that your role was the safest,

LABEL: 0x6815
STRING: but I can't think of anything harder than waiting there idly like you are.』

LABEL: 0x6860
STRING: 「...You got me there.」

LABEL: 0x6905
STRING: As good as my sister was in terms of knowledge and quick thinking,

LABEL: 0x695D
STRING: she had an endless list of other shortcomings. Her sense of time was one of them.

LABEL: 0x699D
STRING: Thanks to her, I had been trained to wait for other people for hours on end when it came to setting up meetings.

LABEL: 0x69FD
STRING: Even though I was used to it, waiting was still hard.

LABEL: 0x6A9D
STRING: 『Good news or not, but we've released all of them now.』

LABEL: 0x6ACF
STRING: 『We'll leave the rest to you, Katagiri-kun.』

LABEL: 0x6B18
STRING: 「Okay. Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x6B3E
STRING: 「What will you do now?」

LABEL: 0x6B7B
STRING: 『We'll check if there's any <COOS> left behind starting from the third floor.』

LABEL: 0x6BC5
STRING: 『We're planning on meeting up with Yukari once we're done with the second floor.』

LABEL: 0x6C02
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x6C7B
STRING: In the end, she had went to the rear section by herself.

LABEL: 0x6CAF
STRING: She had offered many excuses, like how it was easier to move around alone, and that she was wearing insulated shoes.

LABEL: 0x6D13
STRING: Her stubborn attitude was suspicious and made me feel like she had some secret motive,

LABEL: 0x6D73
STRING: but now I was starting to think that wasn't the case.

LABEL: 0x6DC1
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, she had taken on an extremely dangerous role by herself――

LABEL: 0x6E1C
STRING: 『――Are you worried about her?』

LABEL: 0x6E9C
STRING: Hiragino's voice.

LABEL: 0x6EB4
STRING: Startled, I looked up.

LABEL: 0x6ED8
STRING: I saw the same white room before me.

LABEL: 0x6EFA
STRING: From my ear, I heard a voice mixed in with the noise.

LABEL: 0x6F30
STRING: 「Well... She may be reliable, but to go alone like that――」

LABEL: 0x6F91
STRING: 『It'll be fine.』

LABEL: 0x6FB0
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x6FD5
STRING: 『It'll be fine.』

LABEL: 0x6FF4
STRING: He repeated himself.

LABEL: 0x7010
STRING: That made it sound like he was telling that to himself rather than me...

LABEL: 0x7056
STRING: Contrary to such rhetoric, his tone sounded natural.

LABEL: 0x70BD
STRING: 『You don't need to worry about her.』

LABEL: 0x70ED
STRING: 『...Actually, there's no point in worrying.』

LABEL: 0x7124
STRING: He sighed and laughed in resignation.

LABEL: 0x716B
STRING: 『It's the same as always.』

LABEL: 0x7197
STRING: 『No matter how difficult the situation or how impossible the problem,

LABEL: 0x71E3
STRING: she will face it head-on.』

LABEL: 0x724B
STRING: 『It's almost like she doesn't want others to underestimate her. No one doubts her abilities, yet she still runs in recklessly like this...』

LABEL: 0x72AF
STRING: 『There's no point in trying to stop her now.』

LABEL: 0x730A
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x7326
STRING: Wasn't he being too heartless?

LABEL: 0x734C
STRING: I mean, no matter how you looked, this didn't have anything to do with someone doubting her capabilities...

LABEL: 0x73A5
STRING: 『Well, what I'm trying to say is once she's set on something, she'll do it.』

LABEL: 0x73FB
STRING: 『And, she'll come back victorious.』

LABEL: 0x7455
STRING: 『It's a bad induction, but don't worry.』

LABEL: 0x7481
STRING: 『It's how she's always been. She's not one to die in a place like this.』

LABEL: 0x74DA
STRING: 「You got a point there――」

LABEL: 0x7570
STRING: 『It's not fair only you get to talk to him!』

LABEL: 0x759F
STRING: There was a sudden shout.

LABEL: 0x75B9
STRING: I jumped up inside my diving suit in surprise

LABEL: 0x75F7
STRING: due to the sudden increase in volume.

LABEL: 0x764A
STRING: 『Doing all right, Katagiri-san?』

LABEL: 0x7673
STRING: 「...Yeah. Leave it to me.」

LABEL: 0x76A8
STRING: 『I want to conserve power, so I'm turning this thing off for now.』

LABEL: 0x76E7
STRING: 「I'll take care of things here.」

LABEL: 0x771A
STRING: 『Good luck.』

LABEL: 0x773B
STRING: The transmission cut off with a static sound.

LABEL: 0x776D
STRING: Inside the narrow confines of the <SHEEP III>, a cut-off island at the bottom of the sea,

LABEL: 0x77B4
STRING: I alone was isolated within it.

LABEL: 0x7891
STRING: I wondered how long it had been.

LABEL: 0x78B9
STRING: Time marched on silently with no one else here.

LABEL: 0x78E5
STRING: In this place, isolated not only from the surface, but from the ecosystem of the sea outside,

LABEL: 0x7943
STRING: what meaning was there in measuring time?

LABEL: 0x79A3
STRING: 「...They're here.」

LABEL: 0x7A45
STRING: At the top of the stairs.

LABEL: 0x7A5D
STRING: Light peeked through the open door.

LABEL: 0x7A83
STRING: Its color was close to green and made me think of fireflies.

LABEL: 0x7AAF
STRING: It had been a while since I'd seen that light, and while it still gave off a mysterious pattern,

LABEL: 0x7AFF
STRING: it somehow looked warm and gentle to me.

LABEL: 0x7B47
STRING: ――Come to think of it, that was probably the light emitted by the PDAs.

LABEL: 0x7B84
STRING: The light stopped in front of the door, swaying back and forth.

LABEL: 0x7C37
STRING: ...Finally, huh?

LABEL: 0x7C57
STRING: Tension ran through my body.

LABEL: 0x7C77
STRING: It was as if my body had become one size smaller.

LABEL: 0x7CB9
STRING: I shuddered nervously and looked up at the top of the stairs again.

LABEL: 0x7CEF
STRING: And then... my eyes were met with despair.

LABEL: 0x7DD1
STRING: There was no warmth in that light.

LABEL: 0x7DFD
STRING: There was no sign of life in that light.

LABEL: 0x7E35
STRING: There was no scent of the nature or ecosystem that humanity loved.

LABEL: 0x7E79
STRING: To put it mildly, it was bizarre.

LABEL: 0x7E9B
STRING: To put it bluntly, the color it gave off was disgusting.

LABEL: 0x7ED7
STRING: ――<COOS>.

LABEL: 0x7EF3
STRING: Its overwhelming presence that I couldn't put into words took over my thoughts.

LABEL: 0x7F37
STRING: The sight was stunning.

LABEL: 0x7F51
STRING: All I could do was stare.

LABEL: 0x7FE4
STRING: The eerie light changed its shape smoothly and audaciously without knowing that I was watching.

LABEL: 0x803C
STRING: They accepted each other without hesitation and had formed a large mass before I knew it.

LABEL: 0x80F7
STRING: Its pulsing was strangely synchronized.

LABEL: 0x811D
STRING: The vision of it confirmed that it was alive the same time as I was denying its existence.

LABEL: 0x8165
STRING: It was like a single life, or perhaps an innumerable number of beings that formed one whole.

LABEL: 0x8199
STRING: Whether it was particles or waves, I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x81E7
STRING: But it was there, flaunting its existence.

LABEL: 0x8211
STRING: <COOS> was here.

LABEL: 0x824F
STRING: About time, huh?

LABEL: 0x8280
STRING: I turned on the PDA in my hand.

LABEL: 0x82B1
STRING: A light appeared on the screen.

LABEL: 0x82D5
STRING: A pattern of flickering lights.

LABEL: 0x82FF
STRING: Reiri's program.

LABEL: 0x831F
STRING: I stood up and held the PDA up high.

LABEL: 0x834A
STRING: I held it toward the top of the stairs, toward <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x8390
STRING: We were exchanging physical quantities that I couldn't perceive.

LABEL: 0x83C8
STRING: Slowly, the patterns began to harmonize.

LABEL: 0x83FE
STRING: Was a dialogue taking place?

LABEL: 0x8420
STRING: If so, what were they saying?

LABEL: 0x8450
STRING: ...What a meaningless question.

LABEL: 0x8472
STRING: All of the PDAs had the same light pattern.

LABEL: 0x84AD
STRING: And <COOS> flickered in response, as if attracted by it.

LABEL: 0x84F5
STRING: This was not a conversation.

LABEL: 0x851B
STRING: It was just training.

LABEL: 0x8537
STRING: It was being trained by Reiri's program, in other words.

LABEL: 0x856D
STRING: Even the threat that had killed Tokiwa was now in the palm of her hand――

LABEL: 0x85AB
STRING: ――But, what was this light pattern?

LABEL: 0x85E1
STRING: If you were to subdue others through words, you first had to understand them.

LABEL: 0x8635
STRING: What did this pattern mean to <COOS>?

LABEL: 0x8687
STRING: Reiri had explained that it was a perfect imitation, but she hadn't told me anything about its meaning.

LABEL: 0x86DD
STRING: Did she even know herself...?

LABEL: 0x8713
STRING: The two lights were soon in perfect unison.

LABEL: 0x874B
STRING: And right after, the light surged down the stairs like a fluid.

LABEL: 0x87F7
STRING: 「Wait――」

LABEL: 0x8815
STRING: It looked like a single beam of light as it rushed toward me, but it was actually a synthesis of countless lights.

LABEL: 0x8865
STRING: I knew that already, but there were so many of them that I couldn't help but gasp.

LABEL: 0x88AB
STRING: Up close, you could see countless arthropods filled with distorted points of light.

LABEL: 0x88EF
STRING: It was like a scene from hell.

LABEL: 0x8915
STRING: Either that or the contents of glow sticks poured onto the floor.

LABEL: 0x8967
STRING: A torrent of unleashed chaos.

LABEL: 0x898F
STRING: I instinctively dropped the PDA I was holding up.

LABEL: 0x8A3A
STRING: The vortex of light swarmed the PDA obsessively.

LABEL: 0x8A69
STRING: There was something familiar about this scene――

LABEL: 0x8A95
STRING: I shook my head to drown out the flashback of her final moments.

LABEL: 0x8ADD
STRING: If not for the weight of my diving suit, I might have tried to run.

LABEL: 0x8B34
STRING: 『Katagiri-kun, can you hear me?』

LABEL: 0x8B5C
STRING: 『This is Hiragino. Is <COOS> there yet?』

LABEL: 0x8B9B
STRING: 「...It's going well.」

LABEL: 0x8BC6
STRING: 『What did you say? I can't hear you very well.』

LABEL: 0x8BF9
STRING: 「It's going well. You managed to lure them here. The operation was a success.」

LABEL: 0x8C41
STRING: 「All that's left is...」

LABEL: 0x8C61
STRING: I shouldn't think of anything.

LABEL: 0x8C81
STRING: I mustn't look at anything.

LABEL: 0x8CA3
STRING: Don't think about it.

LABEL: 0x8D2F
STRING: I averted my eyes from the vortex of light and put strength into the axe in my right hand once more.

LABEL: 0x8D6F
STRING: ...It's okay.

LABEL: 0x8D89
STRING: The plan's simple, right?

LABEL: 0x8DAD
STRING: This was a simple, clear, and ridiculously brute-force strategy.

LABEL: 0x8DED
STRING: There was no room for hesitation.

LABEL: 0x8E11
STRING: I shouldn't hesitate――

LABEL: 0x8E4E
STRING: 『Got it. Take it easy.』

LABEL: 0x8E7B
STRING: Hiragino's voice turned tense, as if he had sensed something in my desperate tone.

LABEL: 0x8EDC
STRING: 『Things are going well here, too.』

LABEL: 0x8F04
STRING: 『There was no <COOS> on the third floor, and we're now close to the final room of the second floor.』

LABEL: 0x8F4C
STRING: 『If all goes well, we'll meet up with Momoi on the bridge afterward.』

LABEL: 0x8F9C
STRING: 『Everything's fine. Touri-kun and Reiri-kun are doing great, too.』

LABEL: 0x8FE1
STRING: 「That's... good.」

LABEL: 0x9005
STRING: I gave a half-hearted reply, no longer focusing on his words.

LABEL: 0x90EF
STRING: I looked at the swirling light in front of me.

LABEL: 0x9113
STRING: At the collective of violators,

LABEL: 0x9155
STRING: who tried to seize any signs of life for themselves.

LABEL: 0x917D
STRING: They were wild and controlled by an invisible hand, where individual wills acted as one.

LABEL: 0x91CB
STRING: That's right, wild――

LABEL: 0x91E7
STRING: They only moved according to a set of laws.

LABEL: 0x9215
STRING: No matter how ferocious or vicious they were, they couldn't defy the laws of God.

LABEL: 0x925F
STRING: Even <COOS> was not God.

LABEL: 0x9289
STRING: The countless deaths it had caused went without saying.

LABEL: 0x9335
STRING: ――Yes, countless deaths.

LABEL: 0x935F
STRING: The arthropods possessed by this mysterious light had their lives stolen from them. They were, in essence, dead.

LABEL: 0x93BF
STRING: Death itself was trying to seize us, who had survived.

LABEL: 0x9405
STRING: As if to condemn us for living at the cost of so many deaths.

LABEL: 0x9507
STRING: Before I knew it, the amount of light gathered before me had increased considerably.

LABEL: 0x9553
STRING: Looks like the plan was a success.

LABEL: 0x9581
STRING: ...That was Reiri for you.

LABEL: 0x95A1
STRING: Even though the doors to the private rooms were closed,

LABEL: 0x95D1
STRING: luring all of <COOS> inside the <SHEEP III>, which could house over 50 people,

LABEL: 0x9636
STRING: to a single location would have been impossible without her.

LABEL: 0x9683
STRING: I turned on my second PDA and threw it on the floor.

LABEL: 0x96BF
STRING: The light swarmed the PDA just like before.

LABEL: 0x96F4
STRING: A swarm of death.

LABEL: 0x9712
STRING: They had no idea it was a trap... just as planned.

LABEL: 0x9766
STRING: ――Was this light really evil?

LABEL: 0x979A
STRING: Was it something that should be eradicated?

LABEL: 0x97C4
STRING: Wasn't it just a puppet that acted as God dictated?

LABEL: 0x9810
STRING: Or perhaps it spoke for the dead who were trying to tell us something?

LABEL: 0x9860
STRING: I stared blankly at the ominous light.

LABEL: 0x9892
STRING: What was it trying to tell me?

LABEL: 0x9936
STRING: ――What were the passengers of the <SHEEP III> that I killed trying to tell me?

LABEL: 0x9991
STRING: What kind of grudges did they hold?

LABEL: 0x99AD
STRING: What kind of despair had they experienced?

LABEL: 0x99C9
STRING: What kind of suffering had I inflicted upon them?

LABEL: 0x99E7
STRING: What should I do to hear their voices?

LABEL: 0x9A84
STRING: And... how should I respond to them?

LABEL: 0x9AB2
STRING: I was standing here, alive, unable to do anything before the dead writhing in hell in front of me.

LABEL: 0x9B06
STRING: What was I supposed to do?

LABEL: 0x9B28
STRING: Why... did I have to kill them again――

LABEL: 0x9B87
STRING: 『Are you there, Katagiri-kun?』

LABEL: 0x9BAF
STRING: 『We met up with Momoi. Everyone's safe.』

LABEL: 0x9BDB
STRING: 『There are no more of them left on the ship. They're all in front of you now.』

LABEL: 0x9C51
STRING: 『Hey, can you hear me?』

LABEL: 0x9C9E
STRING: I heard Hiragino's voice.

LABEL: 0x9CC4
STRING: I could hear him, but so what?

LABEL: 0x9CFE
STRING: In the end, how much were the words of someone who survived worth?

LABEL: 0x9D42
STRING: I didn't want to see any more death.

LABEL: 0x9D85
STRING: 『Katagiri-san, please respond.』

LABEL: 0x9DAF
STRING: 『This is Momoi. There were no problems in the rear section.』

LABEL: 0x9DF1
STRING: 『I was almost attacked for a moment, but I'm fine. I'm relying on you to take care of the rest.』

LABEL: 0x9E6D
STRING: 『Katagiri-san――Katagiri-san!』

LABEL: 0x9E95
STRING: 『Answer me! Hey!』

LABEL: 0x9EDC
STRING: Their voices were distant.

LABEL: 0x9F02
STRING: An overwhelming light was spreading out before me.

LABEL: 0x9F2A
STRING: It wasn't just my vision―all of my senses were being hacked.

LABEL: 0x9F68
STRING: The life that I had sought... It was right there in front of me, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x9FB4
STRING: 『――Katagiri.』

LABEL: 0x9FD3
STRING: Her unmistakable voice pierced my eardrums.

LABEL: 0xA015
STRING: The voice of a girl between life and death.

LABEL: 0xA03D
STRING: The girl who had been sleeping like she was dead.

LABEL: 0xA067
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0xA094
STRING: 『I don't know what you're trying to do... but you seem to really hate me.』

LABEL: 0xA0E9
STRING: A sound like a dry cough followed.

LABEL: 0xA111
STRING: It took a few seconds for me to realize that the grating sound was laughter.

LABEL: 0xA160
STRING: 『...Well then.』

LABEL: 0xA17A
STRING: 『Let me tell a lost lamb like you one thing.』

LABEL: 0xA24D
STRING: 『What you see before you is what killed Saihouji Tokiwa.』

LABEL: 0xA313
STRING: ――In an instant.

LABEL: 0xA331
STRING: I was swinging the axe down with all my might.

LABEL: 0xA37F
STRING: I swung it down on a pipe as thick as a log.

LABEL: 0xA3B5
STRING: The tip of the axe fell toward the pipe without hesitation.

LABEL: 0xA3F5
STRING: The mass of the diving suit combined with the weight of the axe itself produced enough power to――

LABEL: 0xA5CA
STRING: The impact hit me hard.

LABEL: 0xA5EA
STRING: The hard shell broke and burst.

LABEL: 0xA60E
STRING: My arms felt like they were about to fall off, thanks to the recoil.

LABEL: 0xA63C
STRING: A moment later, I nearly lost consciousness.

LABEL: 0xA664
STRING: There was a sound of overflowing water and steam.

LABEL: 0xA686
STRING: I naturally tried to resist the pressure on my entire body through my diving suit.

LABEL: 0xA6D0
STRING: But that was only for a moment.

LABEL: 0xA6F8
STRING: I lost my balance and took a step back.

LABEL: 0xA728
STRING: Turning my head, I saw light at the edge of my vision.

LABEL: 0xA754
STRING: <COOS>.

LABEL: 0xA76C
STRING: They were still there, emitting light.

LABEL: 0xA7A4
STRING: Death was still staring at me.

LABEL: 0xA7DC
STRING: ――This was my answer.

LABEL: 0xA7FC
STRING: I, we, would live.

LABEL: 0xA828
STRING: In this strange eternity, I'd kill even death and live on.

LABEL: 0xA868
STRING: So, that's why――
